titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Peace Day.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/17/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Supports: (1) the goals celebrated on Peace Day, which is observed each year on September 21; and (2) efforts to raise global awareness of Peace Day and to engage all sectors of society in the peaceful observance of the International Day of Peace in accordance with U.N. General Assembly Resolution 55/282.
